com.vaadin.polymer.vaadin.widget.event

    Package Description
    com.vaadin.polymer.vaadin.widget  
    com.vaadin.polymer.vaadin.widget.event

  • Classes in com.vaadin.polymer.vaadin.widget.event used by com.vaadin.polymer.vaadin.widget.event 
    Class and Description
    ChangeEvent
    Fired when value changes.
    To comply with https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Events/change
    ChangeEventHandler 
    ColumnOrderChangedEvent
    A change in the column order.
    ColumnOrderChangedEventHandler 
    ColumnResizedEvent
    A change in column sizes
    ColumnResizedEventHandler 
    CustomValueSetEvent
    Fired when the user sets a custom value.
    CustomValueSetEventHandler 
    DetailedEventEvent
    Fired when an event registered in the detailedEvents array is fired.
    The name of the event depends of the original event type, for instance if the
    original event is contextmenu the event name will be detailed-contextmenu.
    DetailedEventEventHandler 
    FileAbortEvent
    Fired when abort button is pressed.
    FileAbortEventHandler 
    FileRejectEvent
    Fired when a file cannot be added to the queue due to a constrain:
    file-size, file-type or maxFiles
    FileRejectEventHandler 
    FileRemoveEvent
    Fired after the animation to hide the element has finished.
    FileRemoveEventHandler 
    FileRetryEvent
    Fired when the retry button is pressed.
    FileRetryEventHandler 
    ScrollAnimationFinishedEvent
    Fired when the scroller reaches the target scrolling position.
    ScrollAnimationFinishedEventHandler 
    SelectedItemChangedEvent
    Fired when selected item changes.
    SelectedItemChangedEventHandler 
    SelectedItemsChangedEvent
    A row is selected or deselected.
    SelectedItemsChangedEventHandler 
    SelectionModeChangedEvent
    A change in the selection mode.
    SelectionModeChangedEventHandler 
    SortOrderChangedEvent
    A change in the sorting order.
    SortOrderChangedEventHandler 
    UploadAbortEvent
    Fired when retry abort is requested.
    UploadAbortEventHandler 
    UploadBeforeEvent
    Fired before the XHR is opened.
    UploadBeforeEventHandler 
    UploadErrorEvent
    Fired in case the upload process failed.
    UploadErrorEventHandler 
    UploadProgressEvent
    Fired as many times as the progress is updated.
    UploadProgressEventHandler 
    UploadRequestEvent
    Fired when the XHR has been opened but not sent yet.
    UploadRequestEventHandler 
    UploadResponseEvent
    Fired when we have the actual server response, and before the component
    analises it.
    UploadResponseEventHandler 
    UploadRetryEvent
    Fired when retry upload is requested.
    UploadRetryEventHandler 
    UploadStartEvent
    Fired when the XHR is sent.
    UploadStartEventHandler 
    UploadSuccessEvent
    Fired in case the upload process succeed.
    UploadSuccessEventHandler 
    VaadinDropdownClosedEvent
    Fired after the vaadin-dropdown closes.
    VaadinDropdownClosedEventHandler 
    VaadinDropdownOpenedEvent
    Fired after the vaadin-dropdown opens.
    VaadinDropdownOpenedEventHandler 
    ValueChangedEvent
    Fired when the value changes.
    ValueChangedEventHandler
